analysisTermsFirst: By using our AI analysis service, you acknowledge and consent that our system will automatically access and extract publicly available information from your website. This includes data such as business descriptions, contact information, product or service listings, and other content that is openly accessible to all visitors. The sole purpose of this data retrieval is to analyze and provide insights related to your business, and no information beyond what is publicly visible will be accessed or processed.
analysisTermsSecond: We prioritize your data security and privacy. Our service does not collect, store, or distribute any sensitive, private, or restricted content such as login credentials, personal user data, or confidential business information. All data is handled securely and only used temporarily during the analysis process. We adhere to industry best practices to protect your data from unauthorized access, and we comply with relevant data protection regulations. By continuing to use our service, you confirm that you understand and accept these terms and our responsible approach to data handling.
